solution_line_template: Since Agate has {agate_stones} precious stones and Olivine has {olivine_more_than_agate} more precious stones, then Olivine has {agate_stones}+{olivine_more_than_agate} = <<{agate_stones}+{olivine_more_than_agate}={olivine_stones}>>{olivine_stones} precious stones.
The total number of stones Olivine and Agate has is {olivine_stones}+{agate_stones} = <<{olivine_stones}+{agate_stones}={agate_olivine_total}>>{agate_olivine_total}

Diamond has {diamond_more_than_olivine} more precious stones than Olivine, who has {olivine_stones} stones, meaning Diamond has {olivine_stones}+{diamond_more_than_olivine}= <<{diamond_more_than_olivine}+{olivine_stones}={diamond_stones}>>{diamond_stones} precious stones
In total, they all have {agate_olivine_total}+{diamond_stones} = <<{agate_olivine_total}+{diamond_stones}={total_stones}>>{total_stones} precious stones.
